title: 15 Easy Mealtime Blessings to Teach Your Child

organizations.name: ross / getty images by mary fairchild

text:
Children's Dinner Prayers and Mealtime Blessings 15 Dinner Prayers to Teach Your Christian Child Andersen Ross / Getty Images By Mary Fairchild Updated January 12, 2016 . 
Try teaching your Christian child these mealtime blessings and dinner prayers. Your kids will enjoy learning and praying these simple prayers with rhyme and rhythm. Traditional Dinner Prayer 
And hunger for mercy and justice To us who have food.Amen. A Child's Grace Dinner Prayer 
God is great and God is good,And we thank God for our food;By God's hand we must be fed,Give us Lord, our daily bread .Amen. Dinner Table Prayer -Thank You, Jesus, For Them All 
Round this table, here to prayFirst we thank you for the dayFor our family and our friendsCountless blessings our God sendsThank you, Jesus, for them allFor the great ones and the smallWhen we're happy, when we're sadOn the good days and the badWe are grateful, we are gladAmen. 
Dear Lord, bless this bunchAs we munch on our lunch.Amen. 
A B C D E F GThank you, God, 
Thank you for the world so sweet,Thank you for the food we eat.Thank you for the birds that sing,Thank you God for everything.Amen. 
Which we are about to receive,Through Thy bountyThrough Christ our Lord we pray.Amen. 
O Father, for all thy mercies,And make us mindfulThrough Jesus Christ our Lord.Amen. More Dinner Prayers and Blessings 
Come, Lord Jesus, be our guestMay this food by you be blessed.Amen. 
Bless the food before usThe family beside usAnd the love between usAmen. 
Our Heavenly Father, kind and good,We thank Thee for our daily food.We thank Thee for Thy love and care.Be with us Lord, and hear our prayer .Amen. 
Father, we give our thanksFor food that stays our hungerFor rest that brings us easeFor homes where memories lingerWe give our thanks for theseAmen.
